nodes.text: Truuzdann was a planet in the Corellian sector. It was primarily visited for its small spaceport.

Cornelius Evazan was seen in Truuzdann by the bounty hunter Jodo Kast. Kast was searching for Evazan's head bounty and pursued him. But Evazan escaped thanks to Ponda Baba, who became his new partner.
The Official Star Wars Fact File uses the alternative spelling Truzdaan.
